txt.en:
Ashâmi and I hope you find this letter and you are well. We spoke on our return to Kûr Anzar from Shonith about kismet.
The Shâgani use the word to describe their fate. I like it.
We decided on our own, and then together, we are bound to fight for something beyond the freedom of Shagâna. We came to this decision because of you.
You aided me without expectation of compensation. You allowed me to pursue Ashâmi and shared wholesome advice along the journey. You listened to me. You listened and shared.
You helped Ashâmi in the same manner, selflessly.
We both realize, though our cultures are strange to one another, we are more alike than we are different.
We each appreciate each other, our pasts, and, more importantly, our future. We have pledged to be together, whatever fate plans.
We found our future and our love because fate placed you in our path.
Kismet.
You are eternally our friend.
Raphûz and Ashâmi
